name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在使學生了解認知人因工程理論與研究方法，並使學生能應用這些理論與研究方法來探討與解決實際問題，提升整體系統之績效。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Cognitive Ergonomics
Week 2: Memory and attention (Ch. 22 of Ref. book 1)
Week 3: Emotion and affective computing (Ch. 23 of Ref. book 1)
Week 4: Cognition and action (Ch. 24 of Ref. book 1)
Week 5: Social interaction (Ch. 25 of Ref. book 1)
Week 6: Perception and navigation (Ch. 26 of Ref. book 1)
Week 7: Sensation (Ch. 3 of Ref. book 2)
Week 8: Mid-term exam
Week 9: Designing interactive systems: A fusion of skills (Ch. 1 of Ref. book 1)
Week 10: PACT: A framework for designing interactive systems (Ch. 2 of Ref. book 1)
Week 11: The process of human-centered interactive systems design  (Ch. 3 of Ref. book 1)
Week 12: Usability (Ch. 4 of Ref. book 1)
Week 13: Experience design (Ch. 5 of Ref. book 1)
Week 14: The Home Information Centre (HIC): A case study in designing interactive systems (Ch. 6 of Ref. book 1)
Week 15: Paper Presentation
Week 16: Paper Presentation
Week 17: Invited seminar
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-term exam: 30%
Exercises: 20%
Paper presentation: 20%
Final exam 30%
materials:
1. Designing Interactive Systems by David Benyon, 2nd. Ed., 2010, Pearson (全華)
2. Attention, Perception, and Memory: An Integrated Introduction by Elizabeth A.  Styles, 2005, Psychology Press, NTUT Library Electronic Book.
